data.message: So, are you still butthurt, Trump supporters? That’s old news already, get over it.

replies.message: It's cute how they're still pretending their opinions have any value.
He called them out years ago! And they fell for it!
I don't get it I'm a trump supporter but I'm still a fan
Nope. Just laughing again at this sad has been wigger. LMAO!!
So is the election, but you liberals are still crying about it. 😂😂😂

Do we all have to be associated with Hillary, if I don’t like Trump? 🙂 Cause I don’t like her either. Shit, i guess you guys are that limited minded, aren’t you? 🙂 
Grow up.

Evghenii Ivanovich So basically you would be on facebook bitching either way and no one should take anything you have to say with any merit because you are just one of those people who need internet comments to get their daily feel goods? Real talk bro
Dave Richer bitching? I’m cool. Only people bitching here, are a bunch of crying ass bitches, Trump supporters 🙂
Kyle Hauge nah buddy. Mueller is coming for trumps ugly ass. You guys support a president who blows Putin 24/7
No Evha€bgniiich I’m not complaining
Are all the Trump supporters illiterate?
Evghenii Ivanovich don't you remember? Trump loves the poorly educated!
Well, yeah, but do they have to show it like that? 🤣🤣🤣🤦🏻‍♂️
Evghenii Ivanovich Dave owned you. Hold the L. Stay butthurt 😃
Chad Andrew Laine oh... my life is ruined now 🤷🏻‍♂️
Robert Suchy you cannot be a trump supporter and be a fan of Eminem he already drew the line and decided for you LOL
Bruh something that's old has to be at least a year old lol y'all can't bush that under the rug FUCK NO
Yea yall can’t “bush” that under anything😅

Trump is a puppet just like the rest and Eminem is a sellout pop star fag, going completely against what he started out doing. He’s siding with the mainstream and hating on a guy that the media wants hate for.. fuck Eminem and fuck any POTUS. How anyone can say trump is this and trump is that, after having Obama as president for the last two terms is absolutely ludicrous to me. But hey ho, people are fucking idiots and society is brainwashed to fuck..
Trump 2020 TRUMP 2020
I voted for trump but imma be an eminem fan regardless of what em said and I'll definitely be getting this album
Is anyone crying over hillary? A crook verses a snake is the perfect imagery of your political landscape rn. In the end, you don't win
